titles.title: Western States Trail Study Act of 2008
A bill to amend the National Trails System Act to provide for the study of the Western States Trail.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 4/24/2008--Introduced. Western States Trail Study Act of 2008 - Amends the National Trails System Act to require the Western States Trail, a trail of approximately 100 miles from Squaw Valley to Auburn, California, along which are conducted the Western States Trail Ride and the Western States Endurance Run, to be studied for designation as a national scenic trail.
